nodes.text: E-5s sniper rifles were a model of sniper rifle used by sharpshooters of the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Empire. They saw action under the Separatist Droid Army during the Clone Wars on the planet Felucia. To target opponents attempting to take cover, a B1-series battle droid took up position and used the rifle from a distance. A tubular device was used to connected the rifle's targeting scope to a battle droid's photoreceptors, which saw through red electrobinoculars.
The rifle was also used by the Empire during the Galactic Civil War against the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

The E-5s sniper rifle first appeared in the new Star Wars canon in the 2014 mobile video game Star Wars: Galactic Defense. The rifle originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "Chapter 3" of the Star Wars: Clone Wars television series, which was released on November 11, 2003. The rifle was first identified in Legends in the 2004 Star Wars: Battlefront strategy guide, Star Wars Battlefront: Prima Official Game Guide.
